variants.Description in input context: This variant affects the mitochondrial ATP synthase subunit B, leading to decreased cellular energy production.

Readout description.Result Description: The ATP5B protein expression was undetectable in the HEK293-ATP5B C1216T cells compared to wildtype controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: HEK293-ATP5B WT cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett's multiple comparison test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: ATP5B protein expression greater than or equal to 70% of wildtype controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: ATP5B protein expression less than 30% of wildtype controls.
